plot: Roodaka discusses her past with a Visorak spider and wonders which one of the Toa Hordika will eventually succumb to their bestial side. Meanwhile, Whenua, Nuju, Bomonga and Kualus get into trouble in the ruins of the Archives.
title: BIONICLE: Shadow Play
plot_es: Roodaka discusses her past with a Visorak spider and wonders which one of the Toa Hordika will eventually succumb to their bestial side. Meanwhile, Whenua, Nuju, Bomonga and Kualus get into trouble in the ruins of the Archives.
plot_en: Roodaka discusses her past with a Visorak spider and wonders which one of the Toa Hordika will eventually succumb to their bestial side. Meanwhile, Whenua, Nuju, Bomonga and Kualus get into trouble in the ruins of the Archives.
